main event: A round, white object, the size of a basketball, was observed moving slowly northwest over Devils River, Texas, and eventually faded from sight.
interesting points: The object was described with a long tail and was considered to be a balloon,The sighting lasted for about 1 hour,The observer was using binoculars to view the object,The object faded out of sight due to short fog conditions,No unusual radar readings were recorded during the sighting.
sighted object: round white object, size of a basketball
